page.description: The UX Component is one of the basic building blocks for Alpha Anywhere applications. It is generally the main component for creating mobile apps.

section.description: The UX Builder contains the following tools on it's toolbar.

item.name: [Save_button]
item.description: Save. Saves the currently open grid.

item.name: [Save_As_button]
item.description: Save As. Saves the currently open grid after asking for the path and filename.

item.name: [Insert_Code_button]
item.description: Save Page. Creates a temporary file that contains the grid, optionally opening the page in the HTML Editor.

item.name: [Load_button_2]
item.description: Open. Allows you to select and open an existing grid from any of your projects.

item.name: [New_Query_button]
item.description: New. Allows you to create a new grid.

item.name: [Preview_Button_2]
item.description: Browser. Displays the grid component in a temporary page in your browser of choice.

item.name: [WPT_Grid_BlueLightning]
item.description: Remote Test. Test on a remote device (such as a phone or tablet)

item.name: [Publish_button]
item.description: Publish. Publishes the grid to the destination associated with the selected profile.

item.name: [Control_Panel_button]
item.description: WebÂ Projects. Displays the Web Projects Control Panel.

item.name: [A_SQL]
item.description: SQL. Loads the SQL Tools menu.

item.name: [A_Abutton]
item.description: Web Style Builder. Opens the Web Style Builder

item.name: [A_Server]
item.description: Server. Turn the server on and off, when on the server icon appears green.
